title: Constructivist-Based Mathematics Series Concept Teaching Method Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced High School Mathematics Foundations (Sequences, Limits) and Traditional Instructional Methods Experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing real-time collaboration tools in BYOD environments, incorporating pre-post assessments and weekly reflective journaling

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement three math series concept explanation strategies based on a constructivist approach.
Learners can explain abstract math concepts by converting them into visual and contextual representations.
Learners can develop two or more lesson designs that promote learner-centered inquiry activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
